name: Routine2020 - Virus Arrived
description:
Routine2020 - Virus Arrived : This game contains well designed levels, various zombies, super bosses, simple gameplay, nice graphics and amazing music and sounds effects.

Routine2020 - Virus Arrived is the game were you need to save your Country from the virus, which was spread by the Zombies by killing the Zombies and here the adventure begins!!!.

Your task is to save the Country by playing the role of an Agent Spy Anipy, by jumping over the boxes and killing the Zombies.

{How to play}
+ Use Arrow Keys to Jump and Move
+ Hit S key to shoot/attack
+ Take the Power pills to become stronger and defeat all the zombies
+ Collect all the pills

{Features}
+ Beautiful high-resolution graphics
+ Smooth user interface
+ Music and sound effects
+ Game is free, no purchase required
+ Awesome gameplay similar to retro classic game
+ Amazing characters
+ Different cities
+ Finish the game in one shoot

Enjoy it and have fun !!!.
